faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance for regular services. For airport transfers, 48 hours notice ensures availability. However, we do accommodate last-minute bookings based on availability.

faqs.question: Can I make recurring bookings?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our corporate clients often set up recurring bookings for regular routes. Contact our customer service team to arrange weekly or monthly recurring reservations.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and corporate accounts. Payment is processed securely at the time of booking, with receipts sent via email.

faqs.question: What's included in the airport transfer service?
faqs.answer: Airport transfers include flight tracking, 60 minutes free waiting time for international flights (45 minutes for domestic), meet & greet service, and luggage assistance.

faqs.question: Can I request a specific chauffeur?
faqs.answer: Yes, regular clients can request their preferred chauffeurs. We'll do our best to accommodate based on availability. Build relationships with our professional chauffeurs for a personalized experience.

faqs.question: Are child seats available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide child seats at no extra charge. Please specify the age and number of children when booking so we can ensure appropriate safety seats are installed.

faqs.question: What if my flight is delayed?
faqs.answer: Don't worry! We track all flights in real-time and adjust pickup times accordingly. There's no additional charge for flight delays. Your chauffeur will be there when you land.

faqs.question: How do corporate accounts work?
faqs.answer: Corporate accounts enjoy monthly billing, dedicated account management, priority booking, and detailed reporting. Contact our corporate team to discuss custom packages for your business needs.
